description:
Learn the essential presuppositions upon which NLP is practiced - propel clients, friends and yourself toward limitless possibility!

You'll discover the NLP principles that make it possible to apply the science of communication and NLP effectively. These NLP beliefs are at the very core of dynamic communication with oneself and with others.

Presuppositions are underlying beliefs that support and make the science of NLP readily applicable. Believing and acting as if you believe in these NLP principles will make you a more dynamic communicator, a direct and insightful coach to your clients, and a "friend coach" that lifts others, motivates them and is seen as a true inspirational leader.

In this course you'll learn to apply most important NLP presuppositions for coaching, self-coaching and for living an empowered life.

Join other elite coaches, individuals and famous names who live these NLP presuppositions and impact the lives of others each and every day!
title: NLP: Life Coach - Life Coaching Success Principles: NEW
instructors: NLP, Positive Psychology Coach Patrick Howell
